lesson.title: HubSpot: strengths and when to choose it

questions.question: When is HubSpot a good choice?
options: When you only need a simple pipeline without marketing
When you need marketing + sales + automation in one place
When you need an HR system

questions.question: What belongs in the minimal setup?
options: Lifecycle statuses + deal pipeline + required fields + workflow

questions.question: One HubSpot limitation:
options: License cost and complexity higher than Pipedrive

questions.question: Good workflow example:
options: Form → contact + company → deal → owner assign
